GLUERRORSTRING(3G) GLUERRORSTRING(3G)

NAME

gluErrorString - produce an error string from a GL or GLU error code

C SPECIFICATION

const GLubyte * gluErrorString( GLenum error )









PARAMETERS



  
error

  
Specifies a GL or GLU error code.








DESCRIPTION


gluErrorString produces an error string from a GL or GLU
    error code. The string is in ISO Latin 1 format. For example,
    gluErrorString(GL_OUT_OF_MEMORY) returns the string out of
    memory.


The standard GLU error codes are GLU_INVALID_ENUM,
    GLU_INVALID_VALUE, and GLU_OUT_OF_MEMORY. Certain other GLU
    functions can return specialized error codes through callbacks. See the
    glGetError reference page for the list of GL error codes.






ERRORS


NULL is returned if error is not a valid GL or GLU
    error code.






SEE
  ALSO


glGetError, gluNurbsCallback,
    gluQuadricCallback, gluTessCallback
